title: Drawing, "Hebe Falls and Spills the Nectar Brought to Jupiter", ca. 1810
medium: Pen and brown ink on light blue laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen: Ebe nel portare da bere a Giove incampica e cade sconcia causa di sua gran mole
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Hebe shown falling and spilling nectar she brought for Jupiter, who sits in company of gods.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Hebe Falls and Spills the Nectar Brought to Jupiter", ca. 1810.
ca. 1810. Pen and brown ink on light blue laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3274.
